level.heading: Action on plan of merger by constituent statutory trust.

level.text: A plan of merger shall be consented to by all trustees and all beneficial owners of a constituent statutory trust.
After a merger is approved, and at any time before a filing is made under § 29-1207.04, a constituent statutory trust may amend the plan or abandon the planned merger:
As provided in the plan; and
Except as prohibited by the plan, with the same consent as was required to approve the plan.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 703 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
